title: Hanging, 19th century
description: Long panel, probably a curtain, embroidered across end, up sides and joinings, in red and blue silk, with touches of yellow; drawnwork band worked over in cream silk. Ends fringed from cotton. Design of stylized trees above and below horizontal band of embroidery and drawnwork.

tombstone.epitaph:
Hanging, 19th century.Medium: cotton, silk
Technique: embroidered. 1949-114-10.
